query_text: Can you trade after building on your turn?

chunks.chunk_text: Yes, trading and building can occur in any order.
Roads must connect to your network.
Cities require 3 ore and 2 grain.

ground_truth_answer: Yes, trading and building can occur in any order.

query_text: Can you use a Knight card to move the robber onto the same hex?

chunks.chunk_text: No, you must move it to a different hex.

ground_truth_answer: No, you must move it to a different hex.
